---
title: 'Usage'
order: 2
componentName: 'button'
subCategory: 'actions'
category: 'components'
customPath: '/components/actions/button/css'
---


### Variations

#### Primary button


<div class="if text layout column left">
<div class="if text body">

The primary button is the preferred call-to-action button. The button is used to dictate what the primary action of a view is. Never use more than one primary button for one view.

</div>
</div>

<CodeExamples>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example>
<ButtonPrimary onClick={() => {}}>
  Primary
</ButtonPrimary>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button primary">
 Primary
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
</CodeExamples>


#### Secondary button


<div class="if text layout column left">
<div class="if text body">

Secondary buttons are, secondary. They contain actions that are important, but not the primary action.

</div>
</div>


<CodeExamples>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example>
<ButtonSecondary onClick={() => {}}>
  Secondary
</ButtonSecondary>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button [secondary]">
 Primary
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
</CodeExamples>

#### Text button


<div class="if text layout column left">
<div class="if text body">

Text buttons are buttons for actions that is of minimum importance.

</div>
</div>

<CodeExamples>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example>
<ButtonText onClick={() => {}}>
  Secondary
</ButtonText>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button text">
 Text
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
</CodeExamples>


#### Info button




<div class="if text layout column left">
<div class="if text body">

The info button is used for the rare occasion when you want a button that stands out, when the primary button is not natural to use. <strong class="if">Use sparingly</strong>.

</div>
</div>

<CodeExamples>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example>
<ButtonInfo onClick={() => {}}>
  Secondary
</ButtonInfo>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button text">
 Text
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
</CodeExamples>


### With icons

<Types>
<Type>
<Example>
<ButtonSecondary onClick={() => {}}>
<svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
  <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
    <line x1="3" y1="31" x2="29" y2="31" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
    <line x1="19" y1="6" x2="24" y2="11" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
    <polygon points="11 24 4 26 6 19 23 2 28 7 11 24" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
  </g>
</svg>
Button with icon</ButtonSecondary>
</Example>
<TypeDescription>

An outlined <span class="if color-badge"><span class="if color-drop" style="background-color: #0054f0;"></span>BL 1, BLUE</span> icon in a secondary button.

</TypeDescription>
</Type>
<Type>
<Example>
<ButtonPrimary onClick={() => {}}>
<svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
  <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
    <line data-cap="butt" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" x1="22" y1="22" x2="10" y2="22" stroke-linecap="butt"/>
    <polyline data-cap="butt" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" points="4,22 1,22 1,14 6,7 20,7 24,14 31,14 31,22 28,22 " stroke-linecap="butt"/>
    <circle fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" cx="7" cy="22" r="3"/>
    <circle fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" cx="25" cy="22" r="3"/>
    <line data-cap="butt" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" x1="1" y1="14" x2="24" y2="14" stroke-linecap="butt"/>
    <line data-cap="butt" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" x1="13" y1="7" x2="13" y2="14" stroke-linecap="butt"/>
  </g>
</svg>
Button with icon
</ButtonPrimary>
</Example>
<TypeDescription>

An outlined <span class="if color-badge"><span class="if color-drop" style="background-color: #FAF9F7;"></span>BE 5, LIGHTEST BEIGE</span> icon in a primary button.

</TypeDescription>
</Type>
<Type>
<Example>
<ButtonText onClick={() => {}}>
<svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
  <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
    <line x1="9" y1="1" x2="9" y2="5" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
    <line x1="23" y1="1" x2="23" y2="5" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
    <line data-cap="butt" x1="31" y1="11" x2="1" y2="11" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-linecap="butt"/>
    <rect x="1" y="5" width="30" height="24" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
  </g>
</svg>
Button with icon</ButtonText>
</Example>
<TypeDescription>

An outlined <span class="if color-badge"><span class="if color-drop" style="background-color: #0054f0;"></span>BL 1, BLUE</span> icon in a text button.

</TypeDescription>
</Type>
<Type>
<Example>
<ButtonInfo onClick={() => {}}>
<svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
  <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
    <polygon fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" points="20,1 9,1 5,16 13,16 11,28 27,10 18,10 "/>
  </g>
</svg>
Button with icon</ButtonInfo>
</Example>
<TypeDescription>

An outlined <span class="if color-badge"><span class="if color-drop" style="background-color: #FAF9F7;"></span>BE 5, LIGHTEST BEIGE</span> icon in an info button.

</TypeDescription>
</Type>
<Type>
<Example>
<ButtonPrimary onClick={() => {}}>
  <svg style="height:2rem; width:2rem;margin-right:1rem;" class="if loader dots horizontal" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 64 64"><g class="if svg g"><circle class="if svg circle" fill="#faf9f7" cx="8" cy="32" r="8"/><circle class="if svg circle" fill="#faf9f7" cx="32" cy="32" r="8"/><circle class="if svg circle" fill="#faf9f7" cx="56" cy="32" r="8"/></g></svg>
  Loading
</ButtonPrimary>
</Example>
<TypeDescription>

A <span class="if color-badge"><span class="if color-drop" style="background-color: #FAF9F7;"></span>BE 5, LIGHTEST BEIGE</span> loader in a primary button.

</TypeDescription>
</Type>
</Types>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button [primary|secondary|info|text]">
  <span aria-hidden="true" class="if icon [product|symbol|ui] <iconName>"></span>
  Button with icon
</button>
```

or

```html
<button type="button" class="if button [primary|secondary|info|text]">
  <svg class="if icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
    <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
      <polygon fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10" points="20,1 9,1 5,16 13,16 11,28 27,10 18,10 "/>
    </g>
  </svg>
  Button with icon
</button>
```


### Sizes


<CodeExamples>
  <CodeExample>
    <Toolbox/>
    <Example>
      <div class="if" style="display:flex;flex-wrap: wrap; grid-gap:2rem 2rem;margin-bottom: 2rem;">
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button primary large">Large button</button>
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button primary">Button</button>
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button primary small">Small button</button>
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button primary smaller">Smaller button</button>
      </div>
      <div class="if" style="display:flex;flex-wrap: wrap; grid-gap:2rem 2rem;">
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button secondary large">Large button</button>
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button secondary">Button</button>
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button secondary small">Small button</button>
        <button style="margin:0;" type="button" class="if button secondary smaller">Smaller button</button>
      </div>
    </Example>
  <CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button [large|small|smaller]">Button</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
  </CodeDescription>
  </CodeExample>
</CodeExamples>


### Modes

#### Inverse

<TextLayoutLeft>

The Secondary, Text and Info button can be in inverse mode.

</TextLayoutLeft>


<CodeExamples>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example mode="inverse">
  <div class="if" style="display:flex;">
    <button type="button" class="if button secondary inverse" style="margin-bottom: 0;">
     Inverse
    </button>
    <button type="button" class="if button secondary inverse">
    <svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
      <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
        <line x1="3" y1="31" x2="29" y2="31" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <line x1="19" y1="6" x2="24" y2="11" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <polygon points="11 24 4 26 6 19 23 2 28 7 11 24" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
      </g>
    </svg>
    Inverse
    </button>
  </div>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button secondary inverse">
 Inverse
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example mode="inverse">
  <div class="if" style="display:flex;">
    <button type="button" class="if button text inverse" style="margin-bottom: 0;">
     Inverse
    </button>
    <button type="button" class="if button text inverse">
    <svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
      <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
        <line x1="3" y1="31" x2="29" y2="31" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <line x1="19" y1="6" x2="24" y2="11" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <polygon points="11 24 4 26 6 19 23 2 28 7 11 24" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
      </g>
    </svg>
    Inverse
    </button>
  </div>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button text inverse">
 Inverse
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
<CodeExample>
<Toolbox />
<Example mode="inverse">
  <div class="if" style="display:flex;">
    <button type="button" class="if button info inverse" style="margin-bottom: 0;">
     Inverse
    </button>
    <button type="button" class="if button info inverse">
    <svg class="if icon" style="height:1.5rem; width:1.5rem;margin-right:1rem;" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 32 32">
      <g class="nc-icon-wrapper" stroke-linecap="square" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-width="1.5" style="stroke: currentColor;">
        <line x1="3" y1="31" x2="29" y2="31" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <line x1="19" y1="6" x2="24" y2="11" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
        <polygon points="11 24 4 26 6 19 23 2 28 7 11 24" fill="none" stroke-miterlimit="10"/>
      </g>
    </svg>
    Inverse
    </button>
  </div>
</Example>
<CodeDescription>
<CodeBlock>

```html
<button type="button" class="if button info inverse">
 Inverse
</button>
```

</CodeBlock>
</CodeDescription>
</CodeExample>
</CodeExamples>
